body: Where's the NTR in this story ?

Hey dude below me, there's nothing need to fix here, that's just how it works, that cover page isn't misplace or something, they put it in the front to tell us what will gonna happen in the story which is "they run a dating service with T-dolls" then they proceed to main story.But if you put that in the last page there will be no point, bc the readers will be like "Ok, what's the point of this last page, we already know that they running a dating service".
That cover page is sure not appetizing but if you click on it damn thats a pure treasure
